::Surgital::

     Surgital had to strike fast before Lavatron got out of t=
he net.  Firing a blade wouldn't be too smart, as it would cut the net.  Hm=
m.  Aha!  This would take some accuracy.  Surgital converted his spinning s=
aw into a sharp knife, and stabbed at Lavatron through one of the gaps in t=
he energon rope of the net.
